ref_item.label: AZD5718 Dose 1 + Dapagliflozin 10 mg
ref_item.description: Participants will receive once daily oral dose 1 of AZD5718 for 12 weeks, thereafter add-on therapy of 10 mg dapagliflozin for 8 weeks.

pred_item.label: AZD5718 Dose 1
pred_item.description: Participants receive oral AZD5718 at Dose 1 once daily for 12 weeks. Followed by an 8-week extension where they receive the same AZD5718 dose plus dapagliflozin 10 mg/d.

ref_item.label: AZD5718 Dose 2 + Dapagliflozin 10 mg
ref_item.description: Participants will receive once daily oral dose 2 of AZD5718 for 12 weeks, thereafter add-on therapy of 10 mg dapagliflozin for 8 weeks.

pred_item.label: AZD5718 Dose 2
pred_item.description: Participants receive oral AZD5718 at Dose 2 once daily for 12 weeks. Followed by an 8-week extension where they receive the same AZD5718 dose plus dapagliflozin 10 mg/d.

ref_item.label: AZD5718 Dose 3 + Dapagliflozin 10 mg
ref_item.description: Participants will receive once daily oral dose 3 of AZD5718 for 12 weeks, thereafter add-on therapy of 10 mg dapagliflozin for 8 weeks.

pred_item.label: AZD5718 Dose 3
pred_item.description: Participants receive oral AZD5718 at Dose 3 once daily for 12 weeks. Followed by an 8-week extension where they receive the same AZD5718 dose plus dapagliflozin 10 mg/d.

ref_item.label: Placebo + Dapagliflozin 10 mg
ref_item.description: Participants will receive once daily oral dose of placebo matched to AZD5718 for 12 weeks, thereafter add-on therapy of 10 mg dapagliflozin for 8 weeks.

pred_item.label: Placebo
pred_item.description: Participants receive matching placebo tablets once daily for 12 weeks. Followed by an 8-week extension where they receive placebo plus dapagliflozin 10 mg/d.

ref_item.name: AZD5718
ref_item.description: Participants will receive once daily oral dose of AZD5718 as per the arms they are randomised, and will continue until Week 20.

pred_item.name: AZD5718
pred_item.description: A potent, selective, and reversible 5-lipoxygenase activating protein (FLAP) inhibitor administered orally once daily.

ref_item.name: Dapagliflozin 10 mg
ref_item.description: Participants will receive once daily oral dose of 10 mg dapagliflozin for 8 weeks as an add-on therapy.

pred_item.name: Dapagliflozin
pred_item.description: Sodium-glucose cotransporter-2 (SGLT2) inhibitor administered at 10 mg/d during the 8-week extension period (weeks 13-20) to all participants.

ref_item.name: Placebo
ref_item.description: Participants will receive once daily oral dose of placebo matched to AZD5718, and will continue until Week 20.

pred_item.name: Placebo
pred_item.description: Matching placebo tablets administered orally once daily.

ref_item.measure: Change From Baseline in Reduction of Urine Albumin to Creatinine Ratio (ACR) to Week 20
ref_item.description: The dose response effect of AZD5718 on urine ACR at 20 weeks was evaluated. Values less than 1 indicate improvement from baseline.

pred_item.description: Dose–response effect of AZD5718 plus dapagliflozin (anticipated future standard of care) on UACR. The geometric mean UACR is calculated from triplicate first morning urine samples collected for 3 consecutive days.

ref_item.measure: Change From Baseline in Reduction of Urine ACR to Week 12
ref_item.description: The dose response effect of AZD5718 on urine ACR at 12 weeks was evaluated. Values less than 1 indicate improvement from baseline.

pred_item.description: Dose–response effect of AZD5718 plus current standard of care on UACR.

ref_item.measure: Number of Participants With Adverse Events and Serious Adverse Events
ref_item.description: The safety and tolerability profile of AZD5718 treatment was assessed

pred_item.description: Assessment of adverse events, serious adverse events, physical examinations, vital signs (blood pressure, heart rate, respiratory rate, body temperature, pulse oximetry), electrocardiography, and clinical laboratory tests.

ref_item.measure: Change From Baseline in 24-hours Mean Systolic Blood Pressure to Week 12
ref_item.description: The effect of AZD5718 on ambulatory blood pressure was assessed

pred_item.description: Assessment of the change in 24-hour mean systolic blood pressure.

ref_item.description: The PK of AZD5718 after repeated oral dosing for 20 weeks was evaluated

pred_item.description: Measurement of AZD5718 plasma concentrations. Includes pre-dose samples throughout study and post-dose samples (1-12 hours) in a subgroup.

ref_item.measure: Change From Baseline in Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR) to Week 12
ref_item.description: The effect of AZD5718 on renal function was evaluated
ref_item.timeFrame: Week 1 (Baseline), Week 2, Week 4, Week 8, and Week 12

pred_item.measure: Change in Estimated Glomerular Filtration Rate (eGFR)
pred_item.description: Effect of AZD5718 on kidney function with and without dapagliflozin, calculated using the Chronic Kidney Disease Epidemiology Collaboration (CKD-EPI) equation.
